news.title: 王室、巨星、外星人，全炸了！
英国政府考虑立法剥夺安德鲁王位继承权
news.title0: Government considers removing Andrew from royal line of succession
news.content: 英国政府正考虑立法，将安德鲁·蒙巴顿-温莎从王室继承顺位中移除，以防其未来成为国王。
news.content0: The government is considering introducing legislation to remove Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor from the line of royal succession.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美最高法院裁定特朗普关税违宪，重挫其议程
news.title0: Tariffs ruling is major blow to Trump's second-term agenda
news.content: 美国最高法院裁定，特朗普总统无权依据《1977年紧急经济权力法》单方面征收关税，此举对其贸易政策构成重大打击。
news.content0: Donald Trump had been warning for months that a Supreme Court decision like this would be catastrophic.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 《实习医生格蕾》男星埃里克·戴恩因渐冻症去世
news.title0: Grey's Anatomy star Eric Dane dies at 53 after ALS diagnosis
news.content: 因出演《实习医生格蕾》闻名的美国演员埃里克·戴恩在与肌萎缩侧索硬化症抗争十个月后去世，终年53岁。
news.content0: Eric Dane, the actor best known for his roles on Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria, has died less than a year after revealing he had amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS). He was 53.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普下令政府准备公开外星人与UFO档案
news.title0: Trump directs US government to prepare release of files on aliens and UFOs
news.content: 美国总统特朗普表示，将指示国防部等机构开始识别并公开有关外星生命、不明空中现象及UFO的政府文件。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump says he will direct US agencies, including the defence department, to "begin the process of identifying and releasing" government files on aliens and extraterrestrial life.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 女子因在拉斯维加斯机场遗弃宠物狗被起诉
news.title0: Woman charged over abandoning dog at Las Vegas airport
news.content: 一名女子因涉嫌将两岁的宠物狗遗弃在拉斯维加斯机场的行李称重处，被警方以遗弃动物罪起诉。
news.content0: A woman has been charged with animal abandonment after she allegedly left her two-year-old dog at a Las Vegas airport, police have said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 澳大利亚内陆小镇举办“远离海洋”的沙滩排球节
news.title0: Welcome to Australia's hottest beach event - nowhere near the sea
news.content: 澳大利亚内陆小镇库塔曼德拉在远离海洋400公里的街道上，用近900吨沙子打造临时沙滩，举办年度排球节，吸引数千游客。
news.content0: Like many wild and wacky ideas, it all started down at the pub.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 梅拉尼娅·特朗普向史密森尼博物馆捐赠第二任期就职礼服
news.title0: Melania Trump donates inaugural gown to Smithsonian
news.content: 美国前第一夫人梅拉尼娅·特朗普将其在丈夫第二个总统任期就职典礼上所穿的白色礼服捐赠给史密森尼国家历史博物馆。
news.content0: First Lady Melania Trump stood in front of reporters, supporters and colleagues at the Smithsonian’s National Museum of American History on Friday in an ensemble of frosty wealth essentials – a Bottega Veneta peacoat, leather leggings and Christian Louboutin snakeskin heels – and extolled the virtues of a slash of black fabric that zigzagged across the white column gown she wore for her husband’s second inauguration as president, just over a year ago.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国东海岸将迎强冬季风暴，多地发布暴雪预警
news.title0: Snow chances are trending up along the East Coast from a nor’easter. Here are the latest scenarios
news.content: 一股强冬季风暴预计将袭击美国东北部，部分地区可能降雪超6英寸，纽约长岛等地可能出现暴风雪天气。
news.content0: A potent winter storm will impact the Northeast starting on Sunday, but there are still questions about how big its punch of snow and strong winds will be for some areas.
news.author: CNN

news.title: MLS总裁希望维尼修斯和姆巴佩未来加盟美国足球大联盟
news.title0: MLS Commissioner Don Garber ‘would love’ to see Vinícius Jr. and Kylian Mbappé join the league
news.content: 美国职业足球大联盟总裁唐·加伯表示，希望未来能看到皇马球星维尼修斯和姆巴佩加盟MLS，在北美踢球。
news.content0: On the eve of the new Major LeagueSoccer(MLS) season, MLS Commissioner Don Garber has expressed his interest in Real Madrid superstarsVinícius JúniorandKylian Mbappéeventually becoming part of the league and playing their club soccer in North America.
news.author: CNN
